title: Gini index of Taiwan 2008 to 2018
summary: Overall Gini's concentration coefficient has decreased over the Year.
Gini's concentration coefficient is slightly decreasing from 2009 to 2010, roughly constant from 2010 to 2011, slightly decreasing from 2011 to 2012, and lastly roughly constant from 2012 to 2014.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2011 and 2012.
Maximum Gini's concentration coefficient, about 34.5 was reported at Year 2009
The lowest Gini's concentration coefficient, of value 33.6 was reported at Year 2013, and 2014
